DOC.brief_summary: As screen evaluation , subject needle place transcutaneously baseline visit confirm subject feel pulsation foot toe without flexion one toe . This motor nerve test demonstrate nerve responsive stimulation indicator subject eligible candidate PTNS CAN-Stim therapy . Subjects randomize either CAN-Stim PTNS eligibility determine screen test .
DOC.brief_title: CAN-Stim Compared PTNS Treatment Urinary Urgency Incontinence With Wireless Neuromodulation Technology
DOC.detailed_description: CAN-Stim subject implant unilaterally ( implantation side investigator discretion ) . Subjects educate use transmitter programmer . Therapy deliver minimum 8 hour per day 12 week . Subjects consider responder 13-week follow-up , continue therapy follow total 12 month . Non-responders offer explant device exit study . ( Subjects less 50 % improvement may choose keep device even though may eligible continue study . PTNS subject receive in-office PTNS therapy use Uroplasty device . Unilateral percutaneous stimulation perform standard fashion total 12 week . Primary objective measure 13-week follow-up . At point study participant receive in-office PTNS therapy may choose receive CAN-Stim device least 8 week last PTNS session . Otherwise , may exit trial manage standard care . If choose CAN-Stim device , subject implant unilaterally ( implantation side investigator discretion ) . The subject educate use transmitter programmer . Therapy deliver minimum 8 hour per day 12 week . Subjects consider responder 13-week follow-up , continue therapy follow total 12 month .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis overactive bladder urgency urinary incontinence mixed incontinence ( urge stress ) predominate urge ; Women men â‰¥ 22 year age ; At least 4 incontinent episode associate urgency 3 day void diary least 1 24 hour day ; Motor response transcutaneous tibial nerve stimulation ; Selfreported bladder symptom present > 6 month ; Selfreported fail conservative care > 6 month ( i.e. , pharmacology , dietary restriction , fluid restriction , bladder training , behavioral modification , pelvic muscle training , biofeedback , etc . ) ; Off antimuscarinics beta3 adrenergic agonist least 2 week prior enrollment ; If Tricyclic antidepressant , dosage must stabilize least 3 month ; Have active urethral obstruction/stricture , bladder calculus bladder tumor ; Normal upper urinary tract function ; Capable give informed consent ; Capable willing follow study relate procedure . An active implantable electronic device regardless whether stimulation ON OFF ; Pregnant confirm urine pregnancy test plan become pregnant follow 12 month period ; A positive stress urinary incontinence test ; Less 1 year post partum and/or breastfeeding ; Neurogenic bladder ; Botox use bladder pelvic floor muscle past nine month ; Taking alphablocker therapy ; Have postvoid residual urine volume > 150 cc baseline ; Primary complaint stress urinary incontinence ; Current urinary tract infection ( UTI ) ; Previous treatment sacral neuromodulation ; Previous treatment tibial nerve stimulation , pelvic floor muscle stimulation , biofeedback within past 60 day ; Conditions require Magnetic Resonance Imaging ( MRI ) evaluation diathermy procedure ; Inability operate Protect CANStim System ; Diabetes peripheral nerve compromise severe uncontrolled diabetes ( HbA1C 8.5 great ) ; History coagulopathy bleed disorder ; Anatomical restriction device placement possible ; Are currently participate participate within past 30 day clinical investigation involve impact urinary renal function ; Have life expectancy le 1 year ; Can independently comprehend complete Qol questionnaire ; Deemed unsuitable enrollment investigator base history physical examination ( include bleed disorder anticoagulant medication , peripheral neuropathy ) .
